data: RESP AMB Adult Cystic Fibrosis Distal Intestinal Obstruction Syndrome (DIOS) Management (Module)
Medications
acetaminophen
650 mg cap, PO, q4h, PRN, pain-mild, maximum acetaminophen 4 g/24 hr, dispense qty: 1 bottle
docusate
100 mg, PO, BID
sennosides
17.2 mg, PO, qdaily, drug form: tab, dispense qty: 30 tab, refill(s): 0
lactulose 10 g/15 mL oral liq
30 mL, PO, BID, drug form: oral liq, dispense qty: 480 mL, refill(s): 0
polyethylene glycol 3350
17 g, PO, qdaily, drug form: powder, dispense qty: 1 bottle, refill(s): 0
17 g, PO, BID, drug form: powder, dispense qty: 1 bottle, refill(s): 0
PEGLYTE EQUIV 280 g/4000 mL oral liq
240 mL, PO, as directed, may substitute any brand name, dispense qty: 4,000 mL, refill(s): 0
240 mL, PO, as directed, may substitute any brand name, dispense qty: 4,000 mL, refill(s): 1
sodium biphosphate-SODIUM phosphate adult enema
130 mL, rectal, once, drug form: enema, dispense qty: 1 each
PICO-SALAX EQUIV powder
2 package, PO, qdaily, as directed, dispense qty: 1 box, refill(s): 0
